  • Method Details

    • registerAdminUser

      @PostMapping("/register") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> registerAdminUser(@RequestBody User user)
      Endpoint to register a new admin user. Only accessible by users with ADMIN role.
      Parameters:
      user - The user object containing admin registration details
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with the created UserDto or error message

    • adminLogin

      @PostMapping("/login") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AuthResponse> adminLogin(@RequestBody AuthRequest request)

    • deleteUserByUsername

      @DeleteMapping("/users/deleteByUsername/{username}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteUserByUsername(@PathVariable String username)
      Endpoint to delete a user by username. Only accessible by users with ADMIN role.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to be deleted
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message

    • deleteUserById

      @DeleteMapping("/users/deleteById/{userId}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteUserById(@PathVariable Long userId)
      Endpoint to delete a user by user ID. Only accessible by users with ADMIN role.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to be deleted
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message

    • deleteAllUsers

      @DeleteMapping("/users/delete/all") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteAllUsers(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Endpoint to delete all users with USER role. Only accessible by users with ADMIN role.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a success message

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping("/users") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<UserDto>> getAllUsers()
      Endpoint to retrieve all users. Only accessible by users with ADMIN role.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with a list of UserDto objects
